page.title: 18A PUPIL'S DAY IN TOFTWOOD
page.content: At 10.30 a.m. science had finished and we had break, during which my friends and I walk about the school talking. At 11.00 a.m. we get changed for P.E., it was tennis and we practised our fore-hand shots. At 12.00 I had finished the lesson and my friends and I went to the Dining Hall for my lunch, sandwiches, crisps, chocolate biscuits and a drink. At 12.15 p.m. we came inside because it was raining, we were outside again by 12.45 p.m. and it remained fine till 1.00 p.m. when we have registration. By 1.15 p.m. I was in Maths and stayed there until 2.15 p.m., which is when I go to music. We were there till just after 2.45 p.m. and by 3.00 p.m. we were in R.E., but our teacher was away so we did homework etc. At 3.30 school finished. I stopped in Dereham before getting home at 4.15 p.m.
